snippet.title: Koira | Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Koira is a hand-drawn adventure game published by DON’T NOD and developed by Studio Tolima. 

Koira is a wholesome tale of friendship where you and your new puppy traverse a musical forest, solve ancient puzzles, befriend woodland creatures, and try to find your way home. Avoid danger along the way, as hunters lurk in the shadows...   

Koira will be released on April 17th, 2025 on PC and PlayStation 5. 

Wishlist Koira and play the demo now: https://bit.ly/KOIRA_YTB_Steam 

FOLLOW US: 

X (Twitter): https://twitter.com/DONTNOD_Ent 
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/dontnod_ent/ 
Facebook: https://facebook.com/DONTNOD.Entertai...
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@dont_nod
